verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD spoke to Moses and said,

verses.kjv: Speak unto the children of Israel, that they bring me an offering: of every man that giveth it willingly with his heart ye shall take my offering.
verses.ct: "Tell the Israelites to bring me an offering. You are to accept my offering from everyone whose heart moves them to give willingly.

verses.kjv: And this is the offering which ye shall take of them; gold, and silver, and brass,
verses.ct: Here is what you should collect from them: gold, silver, and bronze,

verses.kjv: And blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine linen, and goats’ hair,
verses.ct: blue, purple, and scarlet yarn, fine linen, goat hair,

verses.kjv: And rams’ skins dyed red, and badgers’ skins, and shittim wood,
verses.ct: ram skins dyed red, fine leather, and acacia wood,

verses.kjv: Oil for the light, spices for anointing oil, and for sweet incense,
verses.ct: olive oil for the lamps, spices for the anointing oil and for fragrant incense,

verses.kjv: Onyx stones, and stones to be set in the ephod, and in the breastplate.
verses.ct: onyx stones, and other gemstones to be mounted on the ephod and the breastplate.

verses.kjv: And let them make me a sanctuary; that I may dwell among them.
verses.ct: Then have them build a sanctuary for me, so that I can live among them.

verses.kjv: According to all that I shew thee, after the pattern of the tabernacle, and the pattern of all the instruments thereof, even so shall ye make it.
verses.ct: You must construct it exactly according to the design I show you — both the tabernacle itself and all of its furnishings.

verses.kjv: And they shall make an ark of shittim wood: two cubits and a half shall be the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof.
verses.ct: "They are to build a chest out of acacia wood — 3 and 3/4 feet long, 2 and 1/4 feet wide, and 2 and 1/4 feet tall.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt overlay it with pure gold, within and without shalt thou overlay it, and shalt make upon it a crown of gold round about.
verses.ct: Cover it with pure gold, both inside and out, and put a gold molding around the top edge.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt cast four rings of gold for it, and put them in the four corners thereof; and two rings shall be in the one side of it, and two rings in the other side of it.
verses.ct: Cast 4 gold rings for it and attach them to its 4 corners — 2 rings on one side and 2 rings on the other.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make staves of shittim wood, and overlay them with gold.
verses.ct: Make carrying poles out of acacia wood and cover them with gold.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt put the staves into the rings by the sides of the ark, that the ark may be borne with them.
verses.ct: Slide the poles through the rings on the sides of the chest so it can be carried.

verses.kjv: The staves shall be in the rings of the ark: they shall not be taken from it.
verses.ct: The poles must stay in the rings permanently — never remove them.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt put into the ark the testimony which I shall give thee.
verses.ct: Place inside the chest the stone tablets of the covenant law that I will give you.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make a mercy seat of pure gold: two cubits and a half shall be the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof.
verses.ct: "Make an atonement cover of pure gold — 3 and 3/4 feet long and 2 and 1/4 feet wide.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make two cherubims of gold, of beaten work shalt thou make them, in the two ends of the mercy seat.
verses.ct: Make 2 cherubim out of hammered gold, placing them at the 2 ends of the atonement cover.

verses.kjv: And make one cherub on the one end, and the other cherub on the other end: even of the mercy seat shall ye make the cherubims on the two ends thereof.
verses.ct: Put one cherub at one end and the other cherub at the opposite end. Form the cherubim as one piece with the atonement cover at both ends.

verses.kjv: And the cherubims shall stretch forth their wings on high, covering the mercy seat with their wings, and their faces shall look one to another; toward the mercy seat shall the faces of the cherubims be.
verses.ct: The cherubim are to have their wings spread upward, overshadowing the atonement cover with their wings. They must face each other, looking down toward the atonement cover.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt put the mercy seat above upon the ark; and in the ark thou shalt put the testimony that I shall give thee.
verses.ct: Set the atonement cover on top of the chest, and put the covenant law that I give you inside the chest.

verses.kjv: And there I will meet with thee, and I will commune with thee from above the mercy seat, from between the two cherubims which are upon the ark of the testimony, of all things which I will give thee in commandment unto the children of Israel.
verses.ct: I will meet with you there. From above the atonement cover, from between the 2 cherubim that are over the chest of the covenant law, I will speak with you and give you all my commands for the Israelites.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt also make a table of shittim wood: two cubits shall be the length thereof, and a cubit the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof.
verses.ct: "Also make a table out of acacia wood — 3 feet long, 1 and 1/2 feet wide, and 2 and 1/4 feet tall.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt overlay it with pure gold, and make thereto a crown of gold round about.
verses.ct: Cover it with pure gold and put a gold molding around the top edge.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make unto it a border of an hand breadth round about, and thou shalt make a golden crown to the border thereof round about.
verses.ct: Make a rim around it about 4 inches wide, and put a gold molding around the rim.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make for it four rings of gold, and put the rings in the four corners that are on the four feet thereof.
verses.ct: Make 4 gold rings for it and attach them to the 4 corners where the 4 legs are.

verses.kjv: Over against the border shall the rings be for places of the staves to bear the table.
verses.ct: The rings should be close to the rim, serving as holders for the poles used to carry the table.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make the staves of shittim wood, and overlay them with gold, that the table may be borne with them.
verses.ct: Make the carrying poles out of acacia wood and cover them with gold, so the table can be transported with them.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make the dishes thereof, and spoons thereof, and covers thereof, and bowls thereof, to cover withal: of pure gold shalt thou make them.
verses.ct: Make its plates, ladles, pitchers, and bowls for pouring out drink offerings — all of pure gold.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt set upon the table shewbread before me alway.
verses.ct: Keep the bread of the Presence on this table in front of me at all times.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make a candlestick of pure gold: of beaten work shall the candlestick be made: his shaft, and his branches, his bowls, his knops, and his flowers, shall be of the same.
verses.ct: "Make a lampstand out of pure gold. Hammer it out as one piece — its base, shaft, cups, buds, and blossoms should all be formed from the same piece.

verses.kjv: And six branches shall come out of the sides of it; three branches of the candlestick out of the one side, and three branches of the candlestick out of the other side:
verses.ct: 6 branches are to extend from its sides — 3 branches on one side and 3 on the other.

verses.kjv: Three bowls made like unto almonds, with a knop and a flower in one branch; and three bowls made like almonds in the other branch, with a knop and a flower: so in the six branches that come out of the candlestick.
verses.ct: Each branch is to have 3 cups shaped like almond blossoms, each with a bud and a flower. This pattern applies to all 6 branches extending from the lampstand.

verses.kjv: And in the candlestick shall be four bowls made like unto almonds, with their knops and their flowers.
verses.ct: On the central shaft of the lampstand itself, there are to be 4 cups shaped like almond blossoms, complete with buds and flowers.

verses.kjv: And there shall be a knop under two branches of the same, and a knop under two branches of the same, and a knop under two branches of the same, according to the six branches that proceed out of the candlestick.
verses.ct: There should be a bud beneath each pair of branches where they extend from the shaft — one bud under the first pair, one under the second pair, and one under the third pair, for all 6 branches.

verses.kjv: Their knops and their branches shall be of the same: all it shall be one beaten work of pure gold.
verses.ct: The buds and branches must all be one piece with the lampstand, the whole thing hammered from a single piece of pure gold.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make the seven lamps thereof: and they shall light the lamps thereof, that they may give light over against it.
verses.ct: Then make 7 lamps for it. When the lamps are lit, they should illuminate the area in front of the lampstand.

verses.kjv: And the tongs thereof, and the snuffdishes thereof, shall be of pure gold.
verses.ct: Its wick trimmers and trays must also be made of pure gold.

verses.kjv: Of a talent of pure gold shall he make it, with all these vessels.
verses.ct: Use 75 pounds of pure gold to make the lampstand and all of these accessories.

verses.kjv: And look that thou make them after their pattern, which was shewed thee in the mount.
verses.ct: Make sure you construct everything according to the exact design that was shown to you on the mountain."
